title: Conditional Statements
concept: This level focuses on decision-making using if, else if and else conditions to compare numbers, characters and handle basic logic. Output must match exactly the expected format.

challenges.title: Positive or Negative
challenges.description: Read an integer and print Positive if number > 0 else Negative if < 0 else Zero.

challenges.title: Even or Odd
challenges.description: Read an integer and print Even or Odd.

challenges.title: Maximum of Two
challenges.description: Read two numbers and print the larger one. If equal print Equal.

challenges.title: Three Number Maximum
challenges.description: Read three numbers and print the largest.

challenges.title: Leap Year
challenges.description:
Check if a year is leap year. Print Yes or No.
Rules: divisible by 400 → Yes; divisible by 100 → No; divisible by 4 → Yes; otherwise No.

challenges.title: Grade System
challenges.description:
Read marks (0–100) and print grade:
>=90: O
>=80: A+
>=70: A
>=60: B
>=50: C
else: F

challenges.title: Vowel or Consonant
challenges.description: Read a lowercase alphabet and print Vowel or Consonant.

challenges.title: Divisible by 3 and 5
challenges.description: Print Yes if n divisible by both 3 and 5 else No.

challenges.title: Uppercase or Lowercase
challenges.description: If character is A–Z print Uppercase else if a–z print Lowercase else Invalid.

challenges.title: Day Name
challenges.description: 1=Monday, 2=Tuesday, ... 7=Sunday. Print corresponding day name. Else print Invalid.
